text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Tumhi svatah apalyala ani apalya kutumbiyanna tya agipasuna vacava,1 jice indhana manava ani dagada aheta, jicyavara kathora hrdayace sakta phariste tainata aheta. Jyanna allaha jo adesa deto, tyaci te avajna karita nahita, kimbahuna jo kahi adesa dila jato tyace palana karatata
